tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (S (S (VP (VBG Writing) (NP (DT a) (NN book)) (ADVP (RB together)) (PP (IN with) (NP (DT another) (NN writer))))) (VP (VBZ is) (NP (NP (DT a) (NN challenge)) (CC and) (NP (DT a) (NN thrill)))) (. !)))
